      • getConnectedNodes

        public PixelNodeList getConnectedNodes()
        get all nodes connected to this by an edge. if a node is connected twice by >= 2 edges it occurs multiple times if a node is connected to itself (ouroboros) it is also included thus "A" would have 2 multiply connected nodes and two spikes thus "O" would have 1 node connected to itself thus "P" would have 1 node connected to itself and one spike
        Returns:
